product_name: OnGuard Bulldog DT U-Lock with 4' Cable
long_description: The OnGuard Bulldog DT U-lock comes with a 4 ft. fully coated, braided steel cable for extra locking options when it comes time to secure your beloved bicycle. Hefty 13mm hardened steel shackle on the U-lock resists cutting, prying and jacking; rubber-coated shackle and crossbar help protect your bike's finish. Dual lock down mechanism secures both sides of the shackle for excellent pull resistance. Bump-proof Z-Cylinder tumbler resists picking, pulling or drilling. Rounded design and centered keyhole eliminate pry points; extra-thick, molded end caps protect against bumps and hits. 10mm-thick braided steel cable features convenient, permanent loops for easy locking; vinyl coating helps protect your bike's finish. Comes with 5 laser-cut keys, 1 of which has an integrated LED light; mounting bracket included. OnGuard rates the Bulldog DT U-lock and cable as a 65 out of 100 on its 100-point security rating system, where higher-rated locks offer increased security.
short_description: The OnGuard Bulldog DT U-lock comes with a 4 ft. fully coated, braided steel cable for extra locking options when it comes time to secure your beloved bicycle.
